task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 15°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To see the full structure of the target building, I need to look up to view its upper section, so I'll rotate the camera upward by 30 degrees.
To view the base of the target building and understand its full vertical extent from ground to roof, I need to rotate the camera downward to a pitch of 0°.
I need to adjust the camera pitch back to 0° to view the target building's mid-section, then prepare to look up to its roof for full height assessment.

After observing the target building's full structure by adjusting camera pitch, I estimate its height to be approximately 18 meters, as it appears to be a 6-story building with each floor roughly 3 meters tall, including a small roof section.
